page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: I am 8 years old. I live with my mum and dad and 3 sisters. I get up at 7.30 get washed and dressed and then I have my breakfast. I have toast and marmalade. Then I get my bag and coat, feed my fish say goodbye and go to get the bus. We get on the bus and go to school. When the bell goes we all go in. We have assembly and afterwards we come back into the classroom to work. When it is playtime I go to buy some crisps. When the bell goes we go in and carry on with our work. At dinner time we have drinks of water or orange. We eat turkey roll,carrots and potatoes and arctic roll. I go home at 3.15 by bus. For tea I have egg,bacon and chips. I go to bed at 9.30
